mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seenema.movie_tbl(movieTitle, genre, plot, director, actors, viewAge, releaseDate, runningTime, postFileName, previewURL, hit) VALUES(#{movieTitle}, #{genre}, #{plot}, #{director}, #{actors}, #{viewAge}, #{releaseDate}, #{runningTime}, #{postFileName}, #{previewURL}, #{hit})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seenema.movie_tbl WHERE movieTitle LIKE #{param1};
SELECT * FROM seenema.movie_tbl WHERE releaseDate >= #{param1} and releaseDate <= #{param2};
SELECT * FROM seenema.movie_tbl WHERE movieTitle LIKE #{param1} and releaseDate >= #{param2} and releaseDate <= #{param3};
